name: CQC Impact Investors / Kenneth Newcombe Fraud
description: CFTC charges against CQC for fraud and manipulation in voluntary carbon credit markets
detection_signals: Claimed emission reductions exceeded physical limits of projects
Monitoring data showed impossible usage patterns
Compression analysis revealed fabricated statistical patterns
Cross-verification with ground-truth data showed 60% discrepancy
lessons_learned: Cookstove projects require continuous monitoring verification
Statistical analysis can detect fabricated usage data
Physics-based constraints must be enforced in methodology
